tree.train

Class SplitGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • tree.train.SplitGenerator

  • public class SplitGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class is used for splitting instances by values of specific attributes.
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

      • binsHaveSameClasses

        private static boolean binsHaveSameClasses(Bin bin1,
                          Bin bin2)
        Determines if two bins' existence maps are equal. That is, if two bins have the same set of class attribute values represented in their bins, this method returns true.
        Parameters:
        bin1 - the first bin
        bin2 - the second bin
        Returns:
        return true if the two bins have the same set of class attribute values represented in their bins. Otherwise, return false.
